entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
